*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to militia, October 18, 1830, Battalion order.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*battalion order*/p*
*p*In conformity with the Militia law of this *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*, drill musters will be held in each of the *person_mentioned*companies */person_mentioned*composing this *person_mentioned*Battalion */person_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="11-06-1830">first Saturday of November next*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Owing to the territorial extent of the*location_mentioned* militia districts*/location_mentioned*, and for the greater convenience of the *person_mentioned*militia men*/person_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*commandant of each company*/person_mentioned* may at his discretion order said muster in *location_mentioned*two places*/location_mentioned*: at one, he will command in person, for the other, he will designate an *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned*of his company.*/p*
*p*Within five days after the muster the *person_mentioned*commandant of each company*/person_mentioned* will make complete returns *location_mentioned*to the office of the *person_mentioned*first adjutant*/person_mentioned* in this place*/location_mentioned*, of the *person_mentioned*officers*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*non commissioned officers*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*privates of his company*/person_mentioned*, noting particularly all absentees and sick, also the arms and accouterments of each *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*non commissioned officer*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*private*/person_mentioned*, and what kind, and those who have none.*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*commandant of each company*/person_mentioned* will also make a general report as to the state of his *person_mentioned*company*/person_mentioned*, and as to any inconveniences, or omissions which experience may have pointed out in the Present militia laws of the state, or on any other subject connected with the *person_mentioned*militia*/person_mentioned*, which in his opinion requires the attention of government to insure a more complete, efficient and convenient organization.*/p*
*p*This order will be circulated by the *person_mentioned*first adjutant*/person_mentioned* to the *person_mentioned*commandant of companies*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-18-1830">18 October 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
